data.description: OOP interface for parsing IDP files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Over the weekend I got distracted long enough to rediscover the
    Internet Dictionary Project (IDP) and wrote a Perl OOP interface for
    searching the various English to Foobar files.

    At least one person I exchange email with thought it was
    interesting, so I figured I would shared it with the CPAN.

    I am open to suggestions for a more suitable name for the package.
    Text::IDP didn't seem quite right, though.

    see also:

    http://www.ilovelanguages.com/IDP/
    http://aaronland.info/perl/ascope/idp/ASCOPE-IDP-1.1.tar.gz
    http://aaronland.info/perl/ascope/idp/docs.html
